configuration:
<% if @job_tracker %>
mapred.job.tracker <%= @job_tracker[:primary_ipaddress] %>:9001
<% end %>
mapred.task.tracker.task-controller org.apache.hadoop.mapred.DefaultTaskController
mapred.task.timeout 3600000
mapred.tasktracker.map.tasks.maximum 6
mapred.tasktracker.reduce.tasks.maximum 3
mapred.max.tracker.failures 20
mapred.child.java.opts -Duser.timezone=UTC -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 -Xmx16g -Djava.io.tmpdir=<%= File.join(node[:hadoop][:tmp_dir].last, 'java') %>
mapred.map.tasks.speculative.execution false
mapred.reduce.tasks.speculative.execution false
mapred.system.dir /mapred/system
mapreduce.jobtracker.staging.root.dir /user
mapred.local.dir <%= node[:hadoop][:tmp_dir].map { |dir| "#{dir}/${user.name}/mapred/local" }.join(',') %>
